entries.description: Update metering to v1.0.4 with increased namespace report generation performance and Prometheus v2.37.9.
Mark all canal CRDs with preserveUnknownFields: false.
Add missing images from envoy-agent DaemonSet in Tunneling expose strategy when running `kubermatic-installer mirror-images`.
Fix a reconcile loop for `seed-proxy-token` Secret on Kubernetes 1.27.
Fix an issue in the kubermatic-installer mirror-images command, which led to failure on the mla-consul chart.
Fix a bug where network and IPv6 subnet pool options were not loading during Openstack cluster creation.

Fix support for keycloak OIDC logout. New field `oidc_provider` was introduced to support OIDC provider specific configurations. Configuring `oidc_provider` as `keycloak` will properly configure the logout workflow.
MLA: fix the Kubernetes overview dashboard in Grafana.
MLA: fix configuration live reload for monitoring-agent and logging-agent.
